trans-unit.source: Provides a type-safe collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma coleção fortemente tipada de objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> que foi adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" /> contém o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o item <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> estiver contido na coleção; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the values copied from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional que é o destino dos valores copiados do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index in the <c>array</c> where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice na <c>array</c> em que a cópia é iniciada.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" /> values to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os valores <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" /> para uma <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice de um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> na <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> of <paramref name="value" /> in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> de <paramref name="value" /> na <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />, se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero em que <c>value</c> deve ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> a ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> into the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> no <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> a ser removido de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes a specific <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup" /> específico do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection" />.
